Articles.Content:
False.. why?

The user below me is probably going to be trekette or rage.

And the user below them will be whichever one didn't post after me.

True.

The user below me is going to hurt our heads

@rewdew: False

@ME True

The user below me thinks i'm crafty.

You are a clever boy...

The user below me will not be rage.

NEVAH!

The user below me Has a user name with a "T" in it.

*Checks* Yup. And so does my first name IRL, for that matter.

The user below me likes popcorn

True. *nom*

The user below me can name the capitol of ecuador.

San Paolo?

Okay, Wikipedia tells me it's Quito. Geography's not my thing, apparently...

The user below me also checked Wikipedia for that one.

Nope i do when there is a movie i want to wiki for ,or superstructures.

The user below me wikied Maker fair.

Nope. I really don't care, either...

The user below me should be sleepin'

NEVER!

The user below me doesn't need sleep

Sadly, I do....

The user below me knows why Toblerone is sad, but amusing.

No...

The user below me can explain the personification of Tolberone

I can, but I shouldn't have to, to you, or a certain segment of KSP fans

The user below me knows to which segment I'm referring.

Uh the young one?

The user below me had 2 peanut butter ,and banana sandwich.

Nope. I don't even like peanut butter!

The person below me has eaten a crayon as a baby.

Nope ,but do putting crayons on the heater to see what happens count.

The user below me has a surge of energy.

False, energy is for others. I prefer Big Mac

User below me has more than 50 flights in progress.

True, I have 56, majority are junk I never end. Like probes that crash onto Kerbin.

User below me is going to be the next user in the chain response of this thread.

Yes PS, I love your username

The user below me has seen whales in the wild

False... way false, i've never even seen the ocean

The user below me is probably going to be trekette or rage.

And the user below them will be whichever one didn't post after me.

However, chances are that either Trekkette or rage will post twice to prove me wrong.

huh wha?

User below me didn't get that either... but still laughed.

true

User below will still be Trekette

false..or true

the user below me watches defiance

No.

The user below me likes calamari.
